title: How to host a virtual watch party
text:
Hosting a virtual watch party is a great way to bring your user group members together and enjoy an event like posit::conf(2023). Here are some simple steps to help you host a successful virtual watch party:

Choose a location. Ensure that you have a location with stable internet connection, a large screen, and a quiet environment. Test the virtual event portal recordings and make sure you are familiar with its features.
Set a date and time: Decide on a specific date and time for your watch party. Because our live streams will be available on demand shortly after the session, you have two options for scheduling an event:

Live: Schedule a virtual watch party during posit::conf(2023). The live streams will take place from 9am - 6pm, Central Time/US. See what time that is for you.
Later date: Schedule a virtual watch party after posit::conf(2023) hours. We hope to have recordings of sessions available on the virtual event portal within a few business days. This gives you the opportunity to schedule outside of the conf hours.

Invite participants: Send out invitations to your user group providing details about the watch party. Include the date, time, and the location.
Share the conference stream: On the day of the watch party, log in to the posit::conf virtual event portal. Share your screen with the participants, displaying the conference stream so everyone can watch and listen together.
Encourage interaction: During the talks, encourage participants to actively engage. Use the Q/A feature of the virtual event portal to ask questions alongside other attendees.
Share on social media: Share your virtual watch party fun on social media! We’d love to see photos, reflections on the talks, and discussion on the awesome tools mentioned during conf. Tag us using the hashtag #positconf2023 so we can reshare with our network, too!
Networking: Provide casual networking among participants during and after the streams.
Follow up and share resources: After the watch party, send a follow-up email to all participants. Express your appreciation for their attendance and provide any relevant resources discussed during the conference.

Please adhere to the code of conduct set by Posit.
We hope that you have a great virtual watch party experience!

title: Welcome to the posit::conf(2023) Virtual Watch Party Kit!
text:
posit::conf(2023) is an annual conference organized by Posit (formerly RStudio). This event is all about bringing together the community and celebrating open-source data science. You can attend the conference either in person or virtually from September 17th to September 20th!
The conference program, curated by Hadley Wickham and the Program Committee, features over 100 engaging and thoughtful keynotes and talks. You can find the complete schedule on our blog.
If you’re not able to attend the conference in person but still want to be part of the experience, you can host or join a virtual watch party. A virtual watch party is a gathering of like-minded individuals who come together online to share the excitement and enjoy the conference together.
If you’re part of a user group and would like support from Posit to host a virtual watch party, simply fill out the form below. We’ll review your submission and get back to you shortly with more information!
We look forward to connecting with you at posit::conf(2023)!

title: About posit::conf(2023)
text:
posit::conf(2023) is an annual conference organized by Posit (formerly RStudio). This event is all about bringing together the community and celebrating open-source data science. You can attend the conference either in person or virtually from September 17 to September 20!
The virtual experience of our hybrid conference is a unique experience that brings together R and Python enthusiasts from different countries, industries, and backgrounds to meet, chat, and share in the excitement of posit::conf online.
The virtual experience includes:

Livestreams of the keynote and talks led by renowned speakers in data from September 19-20.
On-demand recordings available shortly after the scheduled run time of keynotes and talks
Question and answer sessions alongside other attendees during the talks
The opportunity to chat, share, and learn with other attendees, no matter where they are, through our virtual networking platform.
Ask Me Anythings (AMAs) and demos from Posit developers, engineers, and community members.

If you are interested in registering to attend in person, please visit our conference website. Workshops are filling up fast, so get your seat today!
Follow us the conversation and share the excitement using the hashtag #positconf2023!

title: What you get as a virtual watch party host
text:
Thank you for considering hosting a virtual watch party for posit::conf(2023)!
We will provide virtual watch party hosts a discount code for free virtual registration to posit::conf(2023). In addition, we are excited to be able to provide the following swag to participating user groups:

Posit Stickers
Ephemera (paper goods)
T-shirts






Please be aware that shipping times may vary and unfortunately, we cannot guarantee delivery due to ongoing shipping issues worldwide.
